p: Entomological surveillance data is summarized in Table 3. On average, bairro-level infestation was higher during the LIA (2011) survey than for LIRAa surveys (2012, 2013, and 2015), though the maximum bairro-level infestation value (6.45% of visited sites positive for vector immature forms) was recorded in Vila Ellery in January, 2015. The highest average January bairro infestation over the course of the four-years (excluding 2014) was in Cambeba, 3.4%.
